DOC.brief_title: Study Effects BMS-919373 Electrical Activity Heart Using Pacemakers
DOC.criteria: For information regard BMS clinical trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Age 18 year 85 year Eligible patient dualchamber permanent pacemaker Women childbearing potential Patients history Atrial Fibrillation ( AF ) either ( ) Permanent ( i.e . patient AF never sinus rhythm ) ( ii ) Persistent ( i.e . patient 's episode AF longer 7 day require medical intervention , electrical medical cardioversion , return sinus rhythm ) , exclude History Transient Ischemic Attack ( TIA ) stroke last 12 month History clinically significant ventricular arrhythmia ( include isolate monomorphic Premature Ventricular Contractions ( PVCs ) ) . Such arrhythmias mark loss consciousness , emergent cardioversion defibrillation unstable vital sign require medical intervention Complete heart block Planned surgery , endovascular intervention cardioversion within study period History atrial fibrillation
